pkgmetadata.longdescription: Single Cell Cluster-Based Annotation Toolkit for Cellular Heterogeneity // An automatic cluster-based annotation pipeline based on evidence-based score by matching the marker genes with known cell markers in tissue-specific cell taxonomy reference database for single-cell RNA-seq data. See Shao X, et al (2020) doi:10.1016/j.isci.2020.100882 for more details.
